attributes.action: Stop immigration of persons with criminal convictions
attributes.additional_details: Catherine Wells-Burr was killed in the UK by a Polish immigrant, Rafal Nowak with a criminal conviction in Poland for violence. Why was he allowed in? Why isn't the system stopping this from happening? Why isn't the Government protecting its citizens? Apparently he knew he wouldn't be able to visit the USA because they check. Why can't we. How many people like Rafal Nowak are working in care homes?
